item.title: About Me
item.description: Iliya Mohamad Lokman # A passionate software engineer with a strong background in engineering, computer science and mathematics, dedicated to using cutting-edge technologies to solve real-world problems and drive business value. Presently, I am working as a Software Engineer (Machine Learning) at ExxonMobil. Skills # Preferred Tech Stack Machine Learning Front End Development Back End Development Cloud Environment Python JS / TS Go Azure Rust OpenShift Certifications # DeepLearning.AI - Machine Learning Specialization DeepLearning.
